ops::index::IndexMut::index_mut.doc:
Performs the mutable indexing (`container[index]`) operation.

 # Panics

 May panic if the index is out of bounds.

ops::index::Index::index.doc:
Performs the indexing (`container[index]`) operation.

 # Panics

 May panic if the index is out of bounds.

panicking::panic.doc: The underlying implementation of core's `panic!` macro when no formatting is used.
